com.company.GameMovements

public class Game
extends GameMovements
It is the main class to handle the game.

    • makeMove

      public boolean makeMove​(Player player, int start_x, int start_y, java.lang.String description)
      It receives the origin block and how to move and makes movement if possible.
      Parameters:
      player - Who plays the role
      start_x - x_position of origin cell
      start_y - y_position of origin cell
      description - String to say how to move
      Returns:
      True if the movement is done and false if not

      destination - Destination cell
